/21mb.csv?limit=50 21MB CSV Basic Load (Top 50)
/21mb.csv?select=name,email,phone&limit=50 21MB CSV Selection (name,email,phone)
/21mb.csv?sort=name&limit=50 21MB CSV Sorting (by name)
/21mb.csv?where=id>5000&limit=50 21MB CSV Filtering (id > 5000)
/20mb.xlsx 20MB Excel Sheet Listing
/20mb.xlsx/sheet1?limit=50 20MB Excel Sheet Data
/20mb.json 20MB JSON Raw
/20mb-examplefile-com.txt 20MB Text Raw
/ Root Directory (Sample Data)
/sample.csv Small CSV Basic Load
/sample.csv/Name,City Small CSV Columns (Name, City)
/sample.csv?where=age>25 Small CSV Filter (age > 25)
/sample.csv?sort=!^age Small CSV Sort (Age Desc)
/sample.xlsx Small Excel Listing
/sample.xlsx/sheet1 Small Excel Sheet Data
/history.db.zip Zip Archive Listing
